'''Clara''' is [[Lucas Wilder|Lucas's]] nanny.

==History==
When Clara saw that Lucas was sleeping in Violet's bed, she said that Violet needed to stop letting him do that, as it made it impossible for her to get him to sleep in his own bed. Violet said that her input was noted, but Violet was going to let him sleep in her bed anyway. When Violet was paged, she apologized to Clara because she needed her to stay with Lucas while she went back to work.

==Career==
She is a nanny for [[Lucas Wilder]].
